level.heading: Health benefit plan reimbursement.
level.text: All health insurer health benefit plans shall reimburse for newborn hearing screenings conducted under this subchapter.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 7-855.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-276
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-276, see notes following ยง 7-851.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Section 7(b) of D.C. Law 13-276 provided: "(b) Section 4 shall apply to all health benefit plans issued or reissued beginning on the first day of the month 120 days following the effective date of this act."
